casebody.data:
Second Department,

June, 1940.

(June 3, 1940.) Raymond Apollonio, Respondent, v. Charles Chambers, Individually and as Trustee under the Will of James Chambers, I, and Others, Appellants.

Motion for reargument denied, with ten dollars costs. Motion to resettle order denied. Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Present — Lazansky, P. J., Hagarty, Johnston, Taylor and Close, JJ.
